channel.title: AIoT Group on Jianfei Yang (Rocky)
channel.description: Recent content in AIoT Group on Jianfei Yang (Rocky)

item.title: Group
item.description: I am interesed to supervise or collaborate the following research topics: Deep learning for wireless sensing and affective computing Transfer learning and domain adaptation algorithms for robust data-efficient sensing Multimodal learning for IoT sensor fusion and their applications The students are expected to have solid backgrounds on machine learning and deep learning, and are good at Python programming. Pytorch library is highly preferred in our research team.
